channel.title: [714] Rune Online BETA
channel.description:
[CENTER][size=20pt]Rune Online[/size] [URL=http://"http://runeonline.forumotion.com/"]RuneOnline.CO.CC[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/?e4v0ojdfcf1zc4w"]Download Mirror 1[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.2shared.com/file/TimgtuIe/Rune_Online.html"]Download Mirror 2[/URL] [/CENTER]
Rune Online is a brand new server still under heavy development. We currently feature most of the major bosses, including Nex. We also feature some mini-games such as Castle Wars, Duel Arena, and Barrows. Every skill can be trained, and we're always improving on them and tweaking the experience rates. We even have a custom shop system, but you'll have to log in to find out more.
We're always adding new content, and we always ask for feedback to make sure we're doing everything right.
[CENTER] Now for the media.
[IMG]http://i522.photobucket.com/albums/w350/Raji1337/2a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i522.photobucket.com/albums/w350/Raji1337/3a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i522.photobucket.com/albums/w350/Raji1337/1a.png[/img] [IMG]http://i522.photobucket.com/albums/w350/Raji1337/Pets.png[/img] [IMG]http://i522.photobucket.com/albums/w350/Raji1337/Yak.png[/img]
[/CENTER]
